paragraphs.content: Chapter 28
paragraphs.contentHtml: Chapter 28

paragraphs.content: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

paragraphs.content: Command the children of Israel, and say unto them, My offering, and my bread for my sacrifices made by fire, for a sweet savour unto me, shall ye observe to offer unto me in their due season.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Command the children of Israel, and say unto them, My offering, and my bread for my sacrifices made by fire, for a sweet savour unto me, shall ye observe to offer unto me in their due season.

paragraphs.content: And thou shalt say unto them, This is the offering made by fire which ye shall offer unto the LORD; two lambs of the first year without spot day by day, for a continual burnt offering.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And thou shalt say unto them, This is the offering made by fire which ye shall offer unto the Lord; two lambs of the first year without spot day by day, for a continual burnt offering.

paragraphs.content: The one lamb shalt thou offer in the morning, and the other lamb shalt thou offer at even;
paragraphs.contentHtml: The one lamb shalt thou offer in the morning, and the other lamb shalt thou offer at even;

paragraphs.content: And a tenth part of an ephah of flour for a meat offering, mingled with the fourth part of an hin of beaten oil.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And a tenth part of an ephah of flour for a meat offering, mingled with the fourth part of an hin of beaten oil.

paragraphs.content: It is a continual burnt offering, which was ordained in mount Sinai for a sweet savour, a sacrifice made by fire unto the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: It is a continual burnt offering, which was ordained in mount Sinai for a sweet savour, a sacrifice made by fire unto the Lord.

paragraphs.content: And the drink offering thereof shall be the fourth part of an hin for the one lamb: in the holy place shalt thou cause the strong wine to be poured unto the LORD for a drink offering.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the drink offering thereof shall be the fourth part of an hin for the one lamb: in the holy place shalt thou cause the strong wine to be poured unto the Lord for a drink offering.

paragraphs.content: And the other lamb shalt thou offer at even: as the meat offering of the morning, and as the drink offering thereof, thou shalt offer it, a sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the other lamb shalt thou offer at even: as the meat offering of the morning, and as the drink offering thereof, thou shalt offer it, a sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the Lord.

paragraphs.content: ¶ And on the sabbath day two lambs of the first year without spot, and two tenth deals of flour for a meat offering, mingled with oil, and the drink offering thereof:
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ And on the sabbath day two lambs of the first year without spot, and two tenth deals of flour for a meat offering, mingled with oil, and the drink offering thereof:

paragraphs.content: This is the burnt offering of every sabbath, beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.
paragraphs.contentHtml: This is the burnt offering of every sabbath, beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.

paragraphs.content: ¶ And in the beginnings of your months ye shall offer a burnt offering unto the LORD; two young bullocks, and one ram, seven lambs of the first year without spot;
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ And in the beginnings of your months ye shall offer a burnt offering unto the Lord; two young bullocks, and one ram, seven lambs of the first year without spot;

paragraphs.content: And three tenth deals of flour for a meat offering, mingled with oil, for one bullock; and two tenth deals of flour for a meat offering, mingled with oil, for one ram;
paragraphs.contentHtml: And three tenth deals of flour for a meat offering, mingled with oil, for one bullock; and two tenth deals of flour for a meat offering, mingled with oil, for one ram;

paragraphs.content: And a several tenth deal of flour mingled with oil for a meat offering unto one lamb; for a burnt offering of a sweet savour, a sacrifice made by fire unto the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And a several tenth deal of flour mingled with oil for a meat offering unto one lamb; for a burnt offering of a sweet savour, a sacrifice made by fire unto the Lord.

paragraphs.content: And their drink offerings shall be half an hin of wine unto a bullock, and the third part of an hin unto a ram, and a fourth part of an hin unto a lamb: this is the burnt offering of every month throughout the months of the year.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And their drink offerings shall be half an hin of wine unto a bullock, and the third part of an hin unto a ram, and a fourth part of an hin unto a lamb: this is the burnt offering of every month throughout the months of the year.

paragraphs.content: And one kid of the goats for a sin offering unto the LORD shall be offered, beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And one kid of the goats for a sin offering unto the Lord shall be offered, beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.

paragraphs.content: And in the fourteenth day of the first month is the passover of the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And in the fourteenth day of the first month is the passover of the Lord.

paragraphs.content: And in the fifteenth day of this month is the feast: seven days shall unleavened bread be eaten.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And in the fifteenth day of this month is the feast: seven days shall unleavened bread be eaten.

paragraphs.content: In the first day shall be an holy convocation; ye shall do no manner of servile work therein:
paragraphs.contentHtml: In the first day shall be an holy convocation; ye shall do no manner of servile work therein:

paragraphs.content: But ye shall offer a sacrifice made by fire for a burnt offering unto the LORD; two young bullocks, and one ram, and seven lambs of the first year: they shall be unto you without blemish:
paragraphs.contentHtml: But ye shall offer a sacrifice made by fire for a burnt offering unto the Lord; two young bullocks, and one ram, and seven lambs of the first year: they shall be unto you without blemish:

paragraphs.content: And their meat offering shall be of flour mingled with oil: three tenth deals shall ye offer for a bullock, and two tenth deals for a ram;
paragraphs.contentHtml: And their meat offering shall be of flour mingled with oil: three tenth deals shall ye offer for a bullock, and two tenth deals for a ram;

paragraphs.content: A several tenth deal shalt thou offer for every lamb, throughout the seven lambs:
paragraphs.contentHtml: A several tenth deal shalt thou offer for every lamb, throughout the seven lambs:

paragraphs.content: And one goat for a sin offering, to make an atonement for you.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And one goat for a sin offering, to make an atonement for you.

paragraphs.content: Ye shall offer these beside the burnt offering in the morning, which is for a continual burnt offering.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Ye shall offer these beside the burnt offering in the morning, which is for a continual burnt offering.

paragraphs.content: After this manner ye shall offer daily, throughout the seven days, the meat of the sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the LORD: it shall be offered beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.
paragraphs.contentHtml: After this manner ye shall offer daily, throughout the seven days, the meat of the sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the Lord: it shall be offered beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.

paragraphs.content: And on the seventh day ye shall have an holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And on the seventh day ye shall have an holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work.

paragraphs.content: ¶ Also in the day of the firstfruits, when ye bring a new meat offering unto the LORD, after your weeks be out, ye shall have an holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work:
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ Also in the day of the firstfruits, when ye bring a new meat offering unto the Lord, after your weeks be out, ye shall have an holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work:

paragraphs.content: But ye shall offer the burnt offering for a sweet savour unto the LORD; two young bullocks, one ram, seven lambs of the first year;
paragraphs.contentHtml: But ye shall offer the burnt offering for a sweet savour unto the Lord; two young bullocks, one ram, seven lambs of the first year;

paragraphs.content: And their meat offering of flour mingled with oil, three tenth deals unto one bullock, two tenth deals unto one ram,
paragraphs.contentHtml: And their meat offering of flour mingled with oil, three tenth deals unto one bullock, two tenth deals unto one ram,

paragraphs.content: A several tenth deal unto one lamb, throughout the seven lambs;
paragraphs.contentHtml: A several tenth deal unto one lamb, throughout the seven lambs;

paragraphs.content: And one kid of the goats, to make an atonement for you.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And one kid of the goats, to make an atonement for you.

paragraphs.content: Ye shall offer them beside the continual burnt offering, and his meat offering, (they shall be unto you without blemish) and their drink offerings.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Ye shall offer them beside the continual burnt offering, and his meat offering, (they shall be unto you without blemish) and their drink offerings.
